Plot: A faithful teenager being raised by his widowed father is faced with making a decision. Will this decision get him the girl of his dreams or damage the relationship with his father, who has not yet gotten over the death of his wife?
Title: The CONCERT
Writer: Dion Strowhorn Sr. (story), Dion Strowhorn Sr.
Actors: Sheree Bynum, Victor Edwards, Simeon Henderson, Joseph C. Jackson II
